title: The China Syndrome (1979) - Nuclear Meltdown
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0078966/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0078966/</a>


Jane Fonda and a young hippie-style Michael Douglas working as TV reporters uncover dangers and a cover-up of safety hazards at a nuclear power plant. This historic film really stirred up the protests against nuclear power when it hit the cinemas.

The title refers to the theory that if the core of a nuclear power plant melts down, its temperature will be so astronomically high that it will melt its way down through the Earth and perhaps come out on the other side in China.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/China_Syndrome

This film is now only available as full DVDs here at Piratebay, so I post this avi format for those who avoid full DVDs. It is not my own rip, but quality is OK. Even the full DVD has a mediocre stereo effect, as for many other films this old. But at least it is color with good picture quality.

The film is almost 2 hours long, so it's worth 1.14 Giga.
720x480, DivX 5.x/6.x, widescreen.
Burn tested, runs well in my divX player.
